name: Hereditary Spherocytosis
chief_complaint: I feel tired all the time and my skin looks yellow sometimes.
prognosis: Good with proper management, though may have recurrent episodes of anemia
description: Hereditary spherocytosis is an inherited hemolytic anemia characterized by spherical-shaped red blood cells (spherocytes) that are prone to premature destruction in the spleen. This leads to anemia, jaundice, and potential complications like gallstones.
